# RTE - scl_loader

## Installation
```bash
pip install scl_loader -U --user
```

## Licence

Apache 2.0

## Versionning

Use [bumpversion](https://pypi.org/project/bumpversion/)

example : 
```bash
bumpversion --current-version 1.0.0 minor setup.py scl_loader/__init__.py
```
